scripts.compile: npm run compile:session-1 && npm run compile:session-2
scripts.session-1: npm run compile:session-1 && deno run --unstable --allow-ffi --allow-read session-1/mod.ts
scripts.session-2: npm run compile:session-2 && deno run --unstable --allow-ffi --allow-read session-2/mod.ts
scripts.start: npm run session-1 && npm run session-2
